title: Caterpillar Earnings, Revenue Miss in Q3
text:
© Reuters. Caterpillar Earnings, Revenue Miss in Q3

Investing.com - Caterpillar reported third quarter that missed analysts' expectations on Wednesday and revenue that fell short of forecasts.

The firm reported earnings per share of $2.66 on revenue of $12.76B. Analysts polled by Investing.com expected EPS of $2.91 on revenue of $13.43B. That compared to EPS of $2.86 on revenue of $13.51B in the same period a year earlier. The company had reported EPS of $2.83 on revenue of $14.43B in the previous quarter.

Caterpillar follows other major Capital Goods sector earnings this month

On Tuesday, United Technologies reported third quarter EPS of $2.21 on revenue of $19.5B, compared to forecasts of EPS of $2.03 on revenue of $19.32B.

Honeywell earnings beat analysts' expectations on October 17, with third quarter EPS of $2.08 on revenue of $9.09B. Investing.com analysts expected EPS of $2.01 on revenue of $9.12B

Stay up-to-date on all of the upcoming earnings reports by visiting Investing.com's earnings calendar
description: Caterpillar Earnings, Revenue Miss in Q3
